welcome_text: Hey! Thanks for downloading this small demo, I hope you like it!
For starters, move with A and D keys, jump with spacebar, dash with J and attack with K.
You can combo up to two attacks by pressing K while attacking, keep that in mind!
Press E to interact and ESC to go back to the main menu.
demo_end: This is it for now, remember to follow me on my social media for updates!
